title: Executive Order 5312-Power-Site Restoration No. 436
content: Idaho
BOISE MERIDIAN
PATETTE RIVER

So much of the orders of June 10, 1909, creating Temporary Power-Site Withdrawal No. 21, and July 2, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 21, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 7 N., R. 2 E., sec. 32, lot 7;                          sec. 33, lot 3.
ST. JOE RIVER

So much of the orders of December 18, 1909, creating Temporary Power-Site Withdrawal No. 91, and July 2, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 91, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 46 N., R. 1 E., sec. 24, lot 2;                            sec. 25, NE. ¼ of SE. ¼.

T. 45 N., R. 2 E., sec. 1, lots 9, 11, and 12;                            sec. 2, lots 9, 10, 11, and 12;                            sec. 4, lots 11, 13, and 14, NE. ¼ of SE. ¼;                            sec. 6, lot 9;                            sec. 12, lots 1, 2, 3, 4, and 5, NW. ¼ of NW. ¼.
T. 46 N., R. 2 E., sec. 30, lot 4.

T. 45 N., R. 3 E., sec. 5, lots 9, 11, and 15, SE. ¼ of NW. ¼, NE. ¼ of SW. ¼;                            sec. 14, lots 1 and 13, SE. ¼ of NE. ¼;                            sec. 15, E. ½ of NE. ¼, NE. ¼ of SE. ¼.

T. 45 N., R. 4 E., sec. 10, lots 2, 3, and 4, SE. ¼ of NW. ¼, NE. ¼ of SE. ¼;                            sec. 11, lots 1, 2, 5, 6, and 7;                            sec. 15, lots 1, 2, and 3, SE. ¼ of NW. ¼;                            sec. 18, lots 4, 9, and 11.
BOISE RIVER

So much of the orders of March 24, 1910, creating Temporary Power-Site Withdrawal No. 132, and July 2, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 132, as affects lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 2 N., R. 4 E., sec. 7, NW. ¼ of NE. ¼, SE. ¼ of NW. ¼.
CRANE CREEK
So much of the order of December 19, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 168, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 12 N., R. 3 W., sec. 24, N. ½ of NE. ¼, NW. ¼ of SW. ¼, S. ½ of SW. ¼
BLACKFOOT RIVER NO. 2
So much of the order of January 23, 1912, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 241, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 7 S., R. 43 E., sec. 30, SE. ¼;                           sec. 32, SE. ¼.
T. 8 S., R. 43 E., sec. 2, W. ½ of NE. ¼.
PAYETTE RIVER NO. 4
So much of the order of April 16, 1912, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 259, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 7 N., R. 1 E., sec. 15, lots 1 and 2.
SNAKE RIVER
So much of the order of June 27, 1912, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 283, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:

T. 5 S., R. 11 E., sec. 19, lot 4, and SE. ¼ of NE. ¼;                           sec. 20, lots 2 and 3;                           sec. 29, lots 2, 6, and 7;                           sec. 32, lots 2 and 3.
T. 6 S., R. 12 E., sec. 7, lots 5, 6, 7, 8, and 10;                           sec. 8, lots 5, 6, 7, and 8;                           sec. 9, lots 3, 7, and 8.

T. 6 S., R. 13 E., sec. 7, lots 3 and 5;                           sec. 17, lots 4 and 5;                           sec. 18, lots 5 and 6, NE. ¼ of NW. ¼, NE. ¼ of SE. ¼;                           sec. 20, lots 6 and 8,W. ½ of SE. ¼ of NW. ¼, W. ½ of E. ¼ of SE. ¼ of NW. ¼;                           sec. 21, lot 4;                           sec. 28, lots 6 and 7.
COEUR D'ALENE RIVER

So much of the order of October 18, 1912, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 295, as modified by order of modification approved January 8, 1913, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 48 N., R. 5 E., sec. 30, lots 6 and 8, S. ½ of SE. ¼;                            sec. 31, NE. ¼ of NW. ¼;                            sec. 34, lots 6, 7, 8, and 12.
NORTH FORK OF COEUR D'ALENE RIVER
So much of the order of January 29, 1913, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 338, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:

T. 51 N., R. 3 E., sec. 3, lot 10;                            sec. 9, lots 2, 3, 4, and 5;                            sec. 10, lots 1, 6, 7, and 10, SW. ¼ of NW. ¼, NE. ¼ of SE. ¼;                            sec. 11, lots 2 and 6;                            sec. 14, lots 1 and 2.
T. 51 N., R. 4 E., sec. 31, lots 5, 7, and 10;                            sec. 32, SW. ¼ of SW. ¼.
SALMON RIVER NO. 5

So much of the order of May 19, 1913, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 358, as interpreted by Power-Site Interpretation No. 4 approved April 1, 1921, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 24 N., R. 3 E., sec. 14, that part of lot 3 in H. E. No. 447;                            sec. 15, lot 1, and that part of lot 2 and NE. ¼ of SW. ¼ in H. E. No. 447.
MARBLE CREEK
So much of the order of January 13, 1914, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 410, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:

T. 41 N., R. 3 E., sec. 3, NW. ¼, NW. ¼ of SW. ¼;                            sec. 4, S. ½ of SW. ¼;                            sec. 8, E. ½ of NE. ¼, NW. ¼ of SE. ¼, SE. ¼ of SE. ¼;                            sec. 9, N. ½ of NW. ¼, W. ½ of SW. ¼;                            sec. 17, W. ½ of E. ½;                            sec. 20, W. ½ of NE. ¼, SE. ¼ of NE. ¼, NE. ¼ of SE. ¼, W. ½ of SE. ¼;                            sec. 29, NE. ¼, E. ½ of NW. ¼, E. ½ of SE. ¼, NW. ¼ of SE. ¼.
T. 45 N., R. 3 E., sec. 25, W. ½ of NE. ¼, NW. ¼, NW. ¼ of SW ¼.                            sec. 35, N. ½ of NE. ¼, N. ½ of NW. ¼.
COEUR D'ALENE LAKE
So much of the order of February 11, 1915, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 475, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 46 N., R. 1 W., sec. 13, lot 1;                             sec. 24, lot 1.
T. 48 N., R. 2 W., sec. 29, lot 8.
T. 46 N., R. 3 W., sce. 3, lot                               S; and 8.
T. 47 N., R. 3 W., sec. 12, lots 2, 4, and 5.
SOUTH FORK OF BOISE RIVER
So much of the order of November 30, 1915, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 513, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 1 N., R. 7 E., sec. 3, lots 5 and 6;                          sec. 10, NW. ¼ of SE. ¼.
T. 1 N., R. 9 E., sec. 31, lot 11.
T. 2 N. R. 10 E, sec. 18, lots 3, 4 , 6 and 7:                          sec. 24, lot 9.
T. 2 N., R. 7 E., sec. 34, NW. ¼ of NW. ¼.
T. 2 N., R. 10 E., sec. 29, W. ½ of SW. ¼;                            sec. 32, NW. ¼ of NW. ¼.
T. 3 N., R. 10 E., sec. 10, lots 7 and 8;                            sec. 11, lot 2, SW. ¼ of SE. ¼.
T. 1 S., R. 8 E., sec. 8, lots 4, 5, 6, 7, and 8;                         sec. 17, lots 1, 2, 3, and 6.
COEUR D'ALENE LAKE
So much of the order of August 31, 1917, creating Power-Site Reserve No. 654, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 46 N., R. 2 W., sec. 14, SW. ¼ of SE ¼,
T. 48 N., R. 2 W., sec. 3, lot 5.
HERBERT HOOVER
The White House,March 26, 1930.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5312-Power-Site Restoration No. 436 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373085
